msIdentifier.msName: Le livre de la taille de Paris, l'an 1296

projectDesc.ab: The Tax Rolls of Medieval Paris is a TEI (Text Encoding Initiative)-based digital edition of the seven extant tax rolls from the tailles levied on the city of Paris by Philip the Fair between 1292 and 1313. These documents provide a wealth of information about the individual people, demographics, and history of the city.

prefixDef.p: Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the DEPCHA bookkeeping ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.
Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the project-specific DEPCHA ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.
